A tool that apparently cleans some types of errors in HyperTextMarkupLanguage. I've heard it mentioned specifically in relation to FrontPageExpress, but know nothing more.

Anyone out there know more?

http://www.fourmilab.ch/webtools/demoroniser/ : 
"demoroniser - correct moronic and gratuitously incompatible HTML generated by Microsoft applications".
